thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - LIU KANG
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Liu Kang難易度・★★★★★ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Liu Kang)00:17 Sub-Zero (Bi Han)00:54 Scorpion (Hanzo Hasashi)01:35 Sonya Blade02:11 Test Your Might - Wood02:21 Johnny Cage03:01 Kano03:43 Raiden04:19 Test Your Might - Stone04:27 Liu Kang (Mirror Match)05:06 Endurance I (Sub-Zero, Sonya)05:53 Endurance II (Kano, Scorpion)06:54 Test Your Might - Steel07:04 Endurance III (Kano, Raiden)07:57 Goro08:33 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)09:26 Ending & Credits11:44 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
